@snps/core

The heart of the Synapse framework with HTTP server, middleware, caching, performance monitoring, WebSocket support, logging, configuration management, error handling, and monitoring dashboard.

v1.0.0 100% coverage

Package Information

Category: core
Dependencies:
Bundle Size: 45KB
Load Time: < 100ms

Features

HTTP ServerMiddlewareCachingWebSocketLoggingPerformance MonitoringError Handling

Classes

Server

Main HTTP server class with middleware support, caching, and performance monitoring

Singleton 100% coverage

Methods

start(callback: () => void)

Starts the HTTP server on the specified port

use(middleware: (req, res, next) => void)

Adds middleware to the server

Properties

port: number

Server port number

isRunning: boolean

Whether the server is currently running

WebSocketManager

Manages WebSocket connections and real-time communication

Observer 100% coverage

Methods

sendToClient(clientId: string, message: any)

Sends a message to a specific WebSocket client

Properties

connections: Map

Active WebSocket connections

Examples

Basic Server Setup

Create a simple HTTP server with Synapse

typescript beginner 5 min Runnable Interactive 
import { Server } from '@snps/core';

const server = new Server({ port: 3000 });

server.get('/', (req, res) => {
  res.writeHead(200, { 'Content-Type': 'text/html' });
  res.end('
Hello from Synapse!
');
});

await server.start();
